todomd.webview.showCompleted.markdownDescription: Whether completed tasks are shown or not in the webview.

todomd.webview.scrollbarOverflow.markdownDescription: If `true` - show transparent scrollbar on top of items.

todomd.webview.completedStrikeThrough.markdownDescription: Whether completed tasks should have a line drawn on them in the webview.

todomd.webview.showRecurringCompleted.markdownDescription: Whether recurring completed tasks are shown or not in the webview.

todomd.webview.showRecurringUpcoming.markdownDescription: Whether recurring upcoming (not due) tasks are shown or not in the webview.

todomd.webview.showPriority.markdownDescription: Controls whether priority is shown in the webview.

todomd.webview.showCheckbox.markdownDescription: Controls whether checkbox is shown in the webview.

todomd.webview.completionNotificationEna.markdownDescription: When true - show notification after completing a task in a webview.

todomd.webview.showTaskDetails.markdownDescription: EXPERIMENTAL. When true - show box on the bottom of the webview that shows selected task details.

todomd.webview.notificationsEnabled.markdownDescription: When true - show notification after some actions (like task completion) in a webview.

todomd.webview.fontSize.markdownDescription: Controls font size in the webview. [CSS Units](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-size)

todomd.webview.fontFamily.markdownDescription: Controls font family in the webview. [CSS Units](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-family)
todomd.webview.fontFamily.default: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Noto Color Emoji'

todomd.webview.lineHeight.markdownDescription: Controls line height in the webview.

todomd.webview.indentSize.markdownDescription: Controls visual indent of nested elements in a webview.

todomd.webview.customCheckboxEnabled.markdownDescription: Whether checkbox is rendered as native input element or a custom styled element.

todomd.webview.autoShowSuggest.markdownDescription: Show autocomplete when typing. (When disabled suggest can be called by `Ctrl`+`Space`)

todomd.webview.customCSSPath.markdownDescription: Absolute path to custom CSS for the webview.

todomd.webview.tagStyles.markdownDescription: Set different color for any tag in a webview.

todomd.defaultFile.markdownDescription:
Absolute path to file that Tree Views or commands use when no editor is open that matches `#todomd.activatePattern#`.

[**Pick default file**](command:todomd.specifyDefaultFile)

todomd.defaultArchiveFile.markdownDescription:
Absolute path to file that all archived tasks will be moved to. 

[**Pick archive file**](command:todomd.specifyDefaultArchiveFile)

todomd.durationIncludeSeconds.markdownDescription: When enabled - duration (editor, hover) includes seconds.

todomd.autoArchiveTasks.markdownDescription: When enabled - will move tasks to archive file (on completion).

todomd.confirmTaskDelete.markdownDescription: Show confirmation when deleting task from Tree View or Webview.

todomd.activatePattern.markdownDescription:
Choose files that extension will operate on. By default activated on 2 files (todo.md & todo.archive.md). This format is called `Glob`. Examples:

Activate on any (.txt) file - `**/*.txt`.

Activate only on single file (todo.txt) - `**/todo.txt`

Activate on 2 files (todo.txt or task.txt) - `**/{todo,task}.txt`

todomd.getNextNumberOfTasks.markdownDescription: Number of tasks returned by `getFewNextTasks` command.

todomd.sortNestedTasks.description: Controls nested tasks sorting in Tree Views.

todomd.suggestItems.markdownDescription: This extension will only autocomplete tags/projects/contexts located in **1** file. This setting allows you to add items and their description(markdown) to autocomplete in all files (where extension is active). Examples: `#tag`, `+project`, `@context`.

todomd.tagCounterBadgeEnabled.markdownDescription: Shows small badge to show a number of times the tag is present in the active document.

todomd.progressBackground.markdownDescription: Editor decoration for nested tasks progress (pie chart) background.

todomd.progressForeground.markdownDescription: Editor decoration for nested tasks progress (pie chart) foreground.

todomd.statusBarMainEnabled.markdownDescription: Controls visibility of status bar that shows next tasks to complete.

todomd.statusBarCounterEnabled.markdownDescription: Controls visibility of status bar task progress item `1/3 33%`

todomd.addCreationDate.markdownDescription: When creating a task add creation date to it: `{cr:2020-04-30}`

todomd.completionDateIncludeDate.markdownDescription: Whether to include date when completing a task: `{cm}` vs `{cm:2020-04-30}`

todomd.completionDateIncludeTime.markdownDescription: When completing a task add date and time: `{cm:2020-04-30T09:11:17}`

todomd.creationDateIncludeTime.markdownDescription: When creating a task add date and time: `{cr:2020-04-30T09:11:17}`

todomd.closestDueDateIncludeWeekday.markdownDescription: When enabled - editor decoration that shows number of days to the due date adds the weekday name.

todomd.isDev.markdownDescription: For emulating dev mode. Most likely of no use to anyone, except the extension author.

todomd.tabSize.markdownDescription: Number used for parsing nested tasks when indentation cannot be guessed (file is not opened in editor).

todomd.savedFilters.markdownDescription: Filters that you can pick when applying a filter.

todomd.treeViews.markdownDescription: Add more tree views with predefined filters.

todomd.labelDueSymbol.markdownDescription: Prefix for task that is due in labels (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick).

todomd.labelOverdueSymbol.markdownDescription: Prefix for task that is overdue in labels (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick).

todomd.labelInvalidDueSymbol.markdownDescription: Prefix for task that has invalid due date in labels (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick).

todomd.labelShowItems.markdownDescription: Show projects/tags/contexts in labels (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick).

todomd.completedStrikeThrough.markdownDescription: Show strike-through text decoration for completed tasks in editor.

todomd.setDueDateThisWeekDay.markdownDescription: Week day when using set due date command or suggest `SET_DUE_THIS_WEEK`.

todomd.setDueDateNextWeekDay.markdownDescription: Week day when using set due date command or suggest `SET_DUE_NEXT_WEEK`.

isWholeLine.description:
Should the decoration be rendered also on the whitespace after the line text.
Defaults to `false`.

rangeBehavior.description:
Customize the growing behavior of the decoration when edits occur at the edges of the decoration's range.
Defaults to `DecorationRangeBehavior.OpenOpen`.

light.description: Represents theme specific rendering styles for a [text editor decoration](#TextEditorDecorationType).

gutterIconPath.description: An **absolute path** or an URI to an image to be rendered in the gutter.

gutterIconSize.description:
Specifies the size of the gutter icon.
Available values are 'auto', 'contain', 'cover' and any percentage value.
For further information: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj127316(v=vs.85).aspx

before.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted before the decorated text.

contentText.description: Defines a text content that is shown in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

contentIconPath.description:
An **absolute path** or an URI to an image to be rendered in the attachment. Either an icon
or a text can be shown, but not both.

after.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted after the decorated text.

contentText.description: Defines a text content that is shown in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

contentIconPath.description:

or a text can be shown, but not both.

commands.title: Toggle Comment
commands.description: Toggle comment. (Not binded by default). You can bind it only for active file: **{"key": "ctrl+/","command": "todomd.toggleComment","when": "editorFocus && todomd:isActive"}** in keybindings.json.

commands.title: Toggle setting to show recurring upcoming tasks in webview.
Focus Tasks Webview and its filter input
Add a Task to DEFAULT file
Add a Task to ACTIVE file
Sort by Due Date & Priority (default sort)

commands.description: Helper command to set due date relative to now. [Docs](https://github.com/usernamehw/vscode-todo-md/blob/master/docs/docs.md#set-due-date-helper-function-todomdsetduedate)
commands.title: Set due date
Create similar task (same tags, projects, contexts).

commands.description: Get due task from main file. If none are due - get one with the highest priority.
commands.title: Get 1 next task

commands.description: Get several tasks. Due tasks are on top.
commands.title: Get a few next tasks.

colors.description: Color of the `#` symbol between tags
Due date that is either has an invalid format `2020-05` or an invalid date `2020-12-35`
Due date that is either has an invalid format `2020-05` or an invalid date `2020-12-35`
Nested tasks counter editor decoration background.
Nested tasks counter editor decoration foreground.
Nested tasks counter editor decoration border.
Color of completed task icon in Tree View.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run scss & npm run webview & webpack --mode production --color
